ygData.subject: Digest Authentication related
ygData.msgSnippet: If the client knows in advance that server requires Digest Authentication for a resource, can it include Authorization header with each request to avoid 401

If the client knows in advance that server requires Digest Authentication f=
or a resource, can it include "Authorization" header with each request to a=
void 401 error? How about nonce and qop in this case. What are the pros and=
 cons of this approach.

Why I am asking this question is.. we are planning=
 to host a RESTful WS for our partner and all the resources are protected a=
nd needs authentication. Please advise.
